attributes.contentHtml:
HiroBeet I can say that inactive time is not "automatically removed" as our host uses arc ourselves. We do not have anything against you and I have actually already reported bigger hostings.

I would not trust your provider as it clearly is a free trial.

We don't resent you but harassing one of our main management team isn't cool.

I would go by email but that would lead into me barely getting responses. I also did not break 3 main rules. You actually broke about 3+ rules.

I do not respect you as a company purely because you use: Free Trials, AFK Arc Page and other stuff.

attributes.title: SpiralNodes (spiralnodes.xyz) - Using Free Trials and Denying AFK Page

attributes.contentHtml: PolyAnthi I will not repeat the same thing again. Like I said, if you don't believe us in two weeks or less we will be putting up a new node for a real company. I still don't understand why I hate so much. Why don't you report to CentroNodes? I am inviting you to what you are doing. Another thing, could you know what rules I broke? I am very sure that you were the boy who entered our server. You also have no arguments or evidence to call us liars. Or could I know? Please.
